<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Flair](/Feats.aspx?ID=1860) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 153 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Swashbuckler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=43)

**Prerequisites**
[Swashbuckler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1859)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [swashbuckler feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=15/feats) of your choice.

<title level="2">Basic Flair leads to...</title>
[Advanced Flair](/Feats.aspx?ID=1862)
name: Basic Flair
